_header: Our Father in heaven hallowed by Thy name
_description: A paraphrase of the Pater Noster — seven stanzas rhyme royal

BodRawB408.First Lines:
oure fader in heuen halowed br þi nameAs ihesus þis sone
                    tawȝt us to say…
BodRawB408.Last Lines:
…Raunsom us fader with mercy and garceAnd bryng us al to
                    þi blisful place
BodRawB408.Note:
Preceded by Latin, PAter noster qui es in celis sanctificetur nomen
                        tuum (f. 3v).
